conbody.p: MapR Multitopic Streams Consumer originprocessing all unread dataYou can configure the MapR Multitopic Streams Consumer origin to read all unread data in a topic. By default, the MapR Multitopic Streams Consumer origin reads only incoming data.

To read all unread data in the topic, add the auto.offset.reset MapR Streams configuration property to the origin:
On the Connection tab, click the Add icon to add a new MapR Streams configuration property.
You can use simple or bulk edit mode to add configuration properties.
For the property name, enter auto.offset.reset.
Set the value for the auto.offset.reset property to earliest.
